text: bilateral myringotomy with placement of pe tubes
context: bilateral myringotomy with placement of pe tubes   (medical transcription sample report)

postoperative diagnoses:
bilateral chronic otitis media
first, the left and then the right tympanic membrane, was approached.
first, the left and then the right tympanic membrane, was approached.
an anterior-inferior radial incision was made in the left tympanic membrane.
the same procedure was repeated on the right side with similar findings noted of mucopurulent drainage.
a sheehy pressure equalization tube was placed in the myringotomy site.
the patient tolerated the procedure well and returned to the recovery room awake and in stable condition.
